1169010.name: Dark Fairy Fantasy - Weapons and Armor Bundle
1169010.description:
Feel yourself like a powerful hero with a set of additional legendary items.
Weapon and armor bundle contains:

1. Legendary Valor Set
  • Legendary Sword of valor
  • Legendary Plate of Valor
  • Ribbon of Valor
  • Ring of Valor

2. Elite Mercenary Set
  • Elite mercenary sword
  • Elite Mercenary Armor
  • Mercenary Tape
  • Mercenary ring

3. Legendary Elven Swordmaster set
  • Legendary Elven Sword
  • Legendary Elven Armor
  • Elven Ribbon
  • Elven ring

4. The Dark Knight Set
  • The sword of the dark knight
  • Heavy armor of the dark knight
  • The Dark Knight's Tape
  • Ring of the dark knight

All items can be found in chests throughout the game.
1169010.supported_languages: 英语, 简体中文, 俄语
